com.feilong.core.lang

Class ClassLoaderUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.feilong.core.lang.ClassLoaderUtil

  • public final class ClassLoaderUtil
extends Object
    ClassLoader工具类.

    关于查找资源:

    • getResource(String)
    • getClassPath()
    • getClassPath(ClassLoader)
    • getResource(String, Class)
    • getResource(ClassLoader, String)
    • getResources(String, Class)

    "",表示classes 的根目录

    e.q:
    (maven)测试 在web环境中(即使打成jar的情形)
    getResource("") file:/E:/Workspaces/feilong/feilong-platform/feilong-common/target/test-classes/ file:/E:/Workspaces/feilong/feilong-platform/feilong-spring-test-2.5/src/main/webapp/WEB-INF/classes/
    getResource("com") file:/E:/Workspaces/feilong/feilong-platform/feilong-common/target/test-classes/com file:/E:/Workspaces/feilong/feilong-platform/feilong-spring-test-2.5/src/main/webapp/WEB-INF/classes/com/

    关于 Class#getResourceAsStream(String) VS ClassLoader#getResourceAsStream(String)

    基本上,两个都可以用于从 classpath 里面进行资源读取,classpath包含classpath中的路径和classpath中的jar

    假设配置文件在 src/main/resources下面,比如 messages/feilong-core-message_en_US.properties,

    • Class#getResourceAsStream(String) 需要这么写 "/messages/feilong-core-message_en_US.properties", 路径可以写成相对路径或者绝对路径;
      以 / 开头,则这样的路径是指定绝对路径, 如果不以 / 开头, 则路径是相对与这个class所在的包的
    • ClassLoader#getResourceAsStream(String) 需要这么写 "messages/feilong-core-message_en_US.properties",ClassLoader JVM会使用BootstrapLoader去加载资源文件.
      所以路径还是这种相对于工程的根目录即"messages/feilong-core-message_en_US.properties" 不需要"/"
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    feilong
    See Also:
    ClassLoader, URLClassLoader

        public static URL getResource(String resourceName)

        "",表示classes 的根目录

        e.q:
        (maven)测试 在web环境中,(即使打成jar的情形)
        getResource("") file:/E:/Workspaces/feilong/feilong-platform/feilong-common/target/test-classes/ file:/E:/Workspaces/feilong/feilong-platform/feilong-spring-test-2.5/src/main/webapp/WEB-INF/classes/
        getResource("com") file:/E:/Workspaces/feilong/feilong-platform/feilong-common/target/test-classes/com file:/E:/Workspaces/feilong/feilong-platform/feilong-spring-test-2.5/src/main/webapp/WEB-INF/classes/com/

      • getResourceAsStream

        public static InputStream getResourceAsStream(String resourceName,
                                              Class<?> callingClass)
        This is a convenience method to load a resource as a stream.
        The algorithm used to find the resource is given in getResource()
        Parameters:
        resourceName - The name of the resource to load
        callingClass - The Class object of the calling object
        Returns:
        the resource as stream
        See Also:
        getResource(String, Class), "org.apache.velocity.util.ClassUtils#getResourceAsStream(Class, String)"

      • getResource

        public static URL getResource(String resourceName,
                              Class<?> callingClass)
        Load a given resource.

        This method will try to load the resource using the following methods (in order):

        • From Thread.currentThread().getContextClassLoader()
        • From ClassLoaderUtil.class.getClassLoader()
        • From the callingClass.getClassLoader()
        Parameters:
        resourceName - The name of the resource to load
        callingClass - The Class object of the calling object
        Returns:
        the resource

      • getResource

        public static URL getResource(ClassLoader classLoader,
                              String resourceName)
        查找具有给定名称的资源.

        "",表示classes 的根目录

        e.q:
        (maven)测试 在web环境中,(即使打成jar的情形)
        getResource("") file:/E:/Workspaces/feilong/feilong-platform/feilong-common/target/test-classes/ file:/E:/Workspaces/feilong/feilong-platform/feilong-spring-test-2.5/src/main/webapp/WEB-INF/classes/
        getResource("com") file:/E:/Workspaces/feilong/feilong-platform/feilong-common/target/test-classes/com file:/E:/Workspaces/feilong/feilong-platform/feilong-spring-test-2.5/src/main/webapp/WEB-INF/classes/com/
        Parameters:
        classLoader - the class loader
        resourceName - the resource name
        Returns:
        the resource
        Since:

      • getClass

        public static Class<?> getClass(String className)
                         throws ClassNotFoundException
        Load a class with a given name.

        It will try to load the class in the following order:

        • From Thread.currentThread().getContextClassLoader()
        • From ClassLoaderUtil.class.getClassLoader()

        Returns the class represented by className using the classLoader.
        This implementation supports the syntaxes " java.util.Map.Entry[]", "java.util.Map$Entry[]", " [Ljava.util.Map.Entry;", and "[Ljava.util.Map$Entry; ".

        Parameters:
        className - The name of the class to load
        Returns:
        the class
        Throws:
        ClassNotFoundException - If the class cannot be found anywhere.
        Since:
        1.4.0
        See Also:
        ClassLoader.loadClass(String), Class.forName(String), Class.forName(String, boolean, ClassLoader), ClassUtils.getClass(String), ClassUtils.getClass(ClassLoader, String, boolean), "org.springframework.util.ClassUtils#forName(String, ClassLoader)"

      • getClassLoaderByCurrentThread

        public static ClassLoader getClassLoaderByCurrentThread()
        通过 Thread.getContextClassLoader() 获得 ClassLoader.
        Returns:
        the class loader by current thread

        public static ClassLoader getClassLoaderByClass(Class<?> callingClass)

        Returns:
        the class loader by class
        See Also:
